title: an unexpected error
body: Whenever i try to log into lol i always get a messege saing an unexpected error has occured try again later, this has happened for the last few days. Could someone help.

replies.body: That type of error message is a generic one that League will throw whenever it's not entirely sure what went wrong. We can cover the biggest issues with this [**crash guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974). Hit me back up if that doesn't help or if you can describe when that error happens more!
i have the same issue,  it always showed have an unexpected error and happened a few day. i cant play the game !
I can log in if I use wifi and I plug the cable back once Im logged in. Hope it helps for some of U!
